## SQL history

- SQL is developed at IBM in the 1970s by Donald D. Chamberlin and Raymond F. Boyce.
- SQL is based on the article of Edgar F. Codd "A Relational Model of Data for Large Shared Data Banks" @Codd1970relational
- Entity-relationship model introduced by Chen.
- First commercial version was released by Oracle in 1979.


- Although it is defined as declarative, it also has procedural elements.
